markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Apsu (The Waybringer)](/Deities.aspx?ID=149)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Seek and destroy evil, travel the world, help others fend for themselves

**Anathema** Fail to pursue a foe who has betrayed your mercy, attack a creature without certainty of wrongdoing

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, CG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Wisdom or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6)

**Favored Weapon** [jaws](/Weapons.aspx?ID=1) or [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

**Domains** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=5), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=30), [Wyrmkin](/Domains.aspx?ID=57)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Magic Fang](/Spells.aspx?ID=179)

- **4th**
[Creation](/Spells.aspx?ID=54)

- **6th**
[Dragon Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=88)
(metallic dragons only)

</column>
name: Apsu (The Waybringer)
